p: Until present, Bhutan has reported 3 serotypes of DENV circulating in the country; DENV-1, 2 and 3. DENV-2 and 3 were the most predominant serotypes during 2004 and 2005–2006 outbreaks, respectively [ 9]. However, a more recent report found DENV-1 as the most predominant serotype of DENV in Bhutan during 2013–2014 [ 11].
